62 class BatteryBidirectionalInverter
63 {
64 public:
65 
66  BatteryBidirectionalInverter(double ac_dc_efficiency, double dc_ac_efficiency)
67  {
68  _dc_ac_efficiency = 0.01*dc_ac_efficiency;
69  _ac_dc_efficiency = 0.01*ac_dc_efficiency;
70  }
71 
72  double dc_ac_efficiency() { return _dc_ac_efficiency; }
73  double ac_dc_efficiency() { return _ac_dc_efficiency; }
74 
75 
76  // return power loss [kW]
77  double convert_to_dc(double P_ac, double * P_dc);
78  double convert_to_ac(double P_dc, double * P_ac);
79 
80  // return increased power required, i.e 9 kWac may require 10 kWdc
81  double compute_dc_from_ac(double P_ac);
82 
83 
84 protected:
85  double _dc_ac_efficiency;
86  double _ac_dc_efficiency;
87 
88  double _loss_dc_ac;
89  double _loss_ac_dc;
90 };
91 
92 class Battery_DC_DC_ChargeController
93 {
94 public:
95 
96  Battery_DC_DC_ChargeController(double batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency, double pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency)
97  {
98  _batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency = 0.01*batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency;
99  _pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency = 0.01*pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency;
100 
101  }
102 
103  double batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency() { return _batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency; };
104  double pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency() { return _pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency; };
105 
106 
107 protected:
108  double _batt_dc_dc_bms_efficiency;
109  double _pv_dc_dc_mppt_efficiency;
110  double _loss_dc_dc;
111 };
112 
113 class BatteryRectifier
114 {
115 public:
116  // don't know if I need this component in AC or DC charge controllers
117  BatteryRectifier(double ac_dc_efficiency) { _ac_dc_efficiency = 0.01 * ac_dc_efficiency; }
118  double ac_dc_efficiency() { return _ac_dc_efficiency; }
119 
120  // return power loss [kW]
121  double convert_to_dc(double P_ac, double * P_dc);
122 
123 protected:
124  double _ac_dc_efficiency;
125  double _loss_dc_ac;
126 };
127 
139 class ChargeController
140 {
141 public:
143  ChargeController(dispatch_t * dispatch, battery_metrics_t * battery_metrics);
144 
146  virtual ~ChargeController() {};
147 
149  virtual void run(size_t year, size_t hour_of_year, size_t step_of_hour, size_t index, double P_pv, double V_pv, double P_load, double P_clipped) = 0;
150 
152  enum { DC_CONNECTED, AC_CONNECTED };
153 
154 protected:
155 
156  // allocated and managed internally
157  std::unique_ptr<dispatch_t> m_dispatchInitial;
158 
159  // memory managed elsewhere
160  BatteryPower * m_batteryPower;
161  battery_metrics_t *m_batteryMetrics;
162  dispatch_t * m_dispatch;
163 };
164 
172 class ACBatteryController : public ChargeController
173 {
174 public:
176  ACBatteryController(dispatch_t * dispatch, battery_metrics_t * battery_metrics, double efficiencyACToDC, double efficiencyDCToAC);
177 
179  ~ACBatteryController() {};
180 
182  void run(size_t year, size_t hour_of_year, size_t step_of_hour, size_t index, double P_pv, double V_pv=0, double P_load=0, double P_clipped=0);
183 
184 private:
185  // allocated and managed internally
186  std::unique_ptr<BatteryBidirectionalInverter> m_bidirectionalInverter;
187 };
188 
196 class DCBatteryController : public ChargeController
197 {
198 public:
200  DCBatteryController(dispatch_t * dispatch, battery_metrics_t * battery_metrics, double efficiencyDCToDC);
201 
203  ~DCBatteryController() {};
204 
206  void setSharedInverter(SharedInverter * sharedInverter);
207 
209  void run(size_t year, size_t hour_of_year, size_t step_of_hour, size_t index, double P_pv, double V_pv, double P_load=0, double P_pv_clipped = 0);
210 
211 private:
212 
213  // allocated and managed internally
214  std::unique_ptr<Battery_DC_DC_ChargeController> m_DCDCChargeController;
215 
216 };
